workflow.name: ambient_loop_prototype_building_by_location
workflow.display_name: Ambient Loop Prototype Building By Location
workflow.measure_definition_display_name: Ambient Loop Prototype Building By Location

workflow.name: ambient_loop_add_ets_system
workflow.description: Apply an ETS system to a model

workflow.name: ambient_loop_temperature_setpoint
workflow.description: Set the temperature of the ambient loop to a specific value.

workflow.name: hot_water_loop_design_temperature
workflow.description: Set the design temperature of the Hot Water Loop to the specified value.

workflow.name: remove_all_doors
workflow.description: Removes all doors from building envelope.

workflow.name: set_window_to_wall_ratio
workflow.description: Set the window to wall ratio for all facades to a specific value.

workflow.name: set_roof_insulation_r_value
workflow.description: Set the R-Value of roof insulation to a specified value.  Higher R-Values provide better insulation, lowering heat loss and heat gain through the roof.

workflow.name: set_exterior_wall_insulation_r_value
workflow.display_name: Set Exterior Wall Insulation R Value
workflow.measure_definition_display_name: Set Exterior Wall Insulation R Value
workflow.description: Set the R-Value of exterior wall insulation to a specified value.  Higher R-Values provide better insulation, lowering heat loss and heat gain through the exterior walls.

workflow.name: set_heat_pump_heating_coil_rated_cop
workflow.display_name: Set Heat Pump Heating Coil Rated COP
workflow.measure_definition_display_name: Set Heat Pump Heating Coil Rated COP
workflow.description: Set heat pump heating coil gross rated COP.

workflow.name: set_heat_pump_cooling_coil_rated_cop
workflow.display_name: Set Heat Pump Cooling Coil Rated COP
workflow.measure_definition_display_name: Set Heat Pump Cooling Coil Rated COP
workflow.description: Set heat pump cooling coil gross rated COP.

workflow.name: internal_loads_multiplier
workflow.description: Multipliers for LPD, EPD, and people densities.

workflow.name: shift_schedule_profile_time
workflow.description: Shift a single or all schedules in the building by the specified number of hours

arguments.display_name: Choose a Schedule to Shift the Time For.
arguments.name: schedule

arguments.display_name: Distribution for Random Shift Value Generator.
arguments.name: dist

arguments.display_name: Shift Schedule Profiles Forward Lower Limit (24hr, use decimal for sub hour).
arguments.name: shift_ll

arguments.display_name: Shift Schedule Profiles Forward Upper Limit (24hr, use decimal for sub hour).
arguments.name: shift_ul

arguments.display_name: Shift Schedule Profiles Peak for Triangular Distribution.
arguments.name: shift_ct

workflow.name: set_schedule_profile_start_end_times
workflow.display_name: Set Schedule Profile Start End Times
workflow.measure_definition_display_name: Set Schedule Profile Start End Times
workflow.description: Expand or contract schedule profile by specifying new start and end times. The schedule profile shape is preserved.

workflow.name: openstudio_results
workflow.description: This measure creates high level tables and charts pulling both from model inputs and EnergyPlus results. It has building level information as well as detail on space types, thermal zones, HVAC systems, envelope characteristics, and economics. Click the heading above a chart to view a table of the chart data.

workflow.name: generic_qaqc
workflow.description: This measure extracts key simulation results and performs basic model QAQC checks. Each category of checks provides a description of the source of the check. In some cases the target standards and tollerances are adjustable.

arguments.display_name: Mechanical System Part Load Efficiency Tolerance
arguments.name: check_mech_sys_part_load_eff_tol

arguments.display_name: Simultaneous Heating and Cooling Max Tolerance
arguments.name: check_simultaneous_heating_and_cooling_max_tol

arguments.display_name: Supply and Zone Air Temperature Tolerance
arguments.name: check_supply_air_and_thermostat_temp_difference_tol

workflow.name: ambient_loop_reports
workflow.description: Add report variables for post processing the ambient loop data.
